tooltip.verdant_arcanum.grove_soil: Rich soil infused with arcane energy
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.grove_soil.detai: Required for growing special magical plants
Supports faster growth for most arcane plants

Goes through 3 growth stages: Seed → Bud → Bloom
Grows faster when exposed to higher temperatures
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.flame_flower_blo: A vibrant flower with ember-like petals
Can be brewed into potions of Fire Resistance
Emits a faint warmth when held
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.spell_essence: Pure magical essence extracted from a magical plant
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.spell_essence.ro: Contains the essence of earth binding
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.spell_essence.de: Can be used to graft magical properties into a Living Staff
Required for advanced magical crafting recipes
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.spell_essence.fl: Casts a small fireball when used
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.spell_essence.bl: Teleports you in the direction you're looking
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.spell_essence.ro: Slows down nearby entities with magical vines
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.spell_essence.gu: Pushes entities away with a gust of wind
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.living_staff: A staff that bonds with magical essences
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.living_staff.det: Right-click with spell essence in hand to graft it to the staff
Right-click to cast the active spell
Sneak + Right-click to cycle between grafted spells
